Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities directly followed by \Payment Handled\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\ activities that lead to \Payment Handled\ within the same case.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities with amounts above 100 euros.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities by \SYSTEM\ resource.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities over \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases where \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ occurred.
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Payment Handled' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases without \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities that occur after \Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION\.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities in relation to the total number of activities in the event log.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Average number of days from \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ to \Payment Handled\.
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases with \Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER\.
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Payment Handled' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities that follow \Request Payment\ without any rejections in between.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases that involved \Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION\.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage decrease in \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ when followed by a successful \Payment Handled\.
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities that are followed by any corrective actions or appeals.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'corrective action'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities grouped by \case:BudgetNumber\.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities grouped by the last value of case:BudgetNumber

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases with prior \Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'
